comment: Poor Jimmie! Somebody should mail him some balls. Doesn't matter what kind, from a deer they shot, a pig they slaughtered, any source will do. It'll be % more than he has now. More than he has of his own, that is. Who knows what he's doing with other people's balls in his spare time.

      :snt1 (p / person

                  :op1 "Jimmie")
            :mod (p2 / poor))

      :snt5 (h4 / have-quant-91

                  :ARG1 b2)
            :mod (t2 / that))
      :snt6 (k / know-01

            :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (d3 / do-02
                        :ARG0 (h6 / he)

                              :poss (p5 / person
                                    :mod o2)))

comment: Please do not use terms that discriminate based on sexual orientation.
amr:

comment: Whoa there, homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you

            :location (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (h / homophobia)))
            :op2 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
